TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class TreeNodeCollection : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

public ref class TreeNodeCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type TreeNodeCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IStateManager

summary.span: 表示 控件中 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理 控件中对象的集合 。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in the control. 控件 在其两个属性中使用类。The control uses the class in two of its properties. 它将其根节点存储在属性中 ，并将其所选节点存储在 属性中。It stores its root nodes in the property and its selected nodes in the property. 集合还用于 存储子节点 (如有任何) 。The collection is also used for the property to store child nodes (if any). 类支持多种方法来访问集合中的项：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用 索引器 在特定的从零开始的索引处直接检索对象。Use the indexer to retrieve a object directly at a specific zero-based index. - 使用 方法可创建一个可用于循环访问集合的枚举器。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用 `foreach` (c # ) 或 `For Each` (Visual Basic) 来循环访问集合。Use `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. - 使用 方法可将集合的内容复制到 对象中。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an object. 可以 通过添加和删除对象以编程方式管理 。You can programmatically manage the by adding and removing objects. 若要向集合添加节点，请使用 或 方法。To add nodes to the collection, use the or method. 若要从集合中删除节点，请使用 、 或 方法。To remove nodes from the collection, use the , , or method. > [!NOTE] > 将 控件绑定到数据源后， 每次发生绑定时，将自动填充和集合。When the control is bound to a data source, the and collections are automatically populated each time binding occurs. 绑定之间对集合所做的任何更改都将丢失。Any changes to the collections between bindings will be lost. 若要保留这些更改，请更新数据源，或者在每次绑定时手动重新生成集合。To retain these changes, either update the data source or manually rebuild the collection each time you bind. 包含的属性和方法可用于检索有关集合本身的信息。The contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself. 若要确定集合中有多少项，请使用 属性。To find out how many items are in the collection, use the property. 如果要确定集合是否包含某个 对象，请使用 方法。If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain object, use the method. 若要获取 集合中对象的索引，请使用 方法。To get the index of a object in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式将节点添加到中，并将其从中移除 。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add nodes to and remove them from a . 请注意， 和 属性返回 对象。Notice that the and properties return a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionAdd/CS/treenodecollectionaddcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionAdd/VB/treenodecollectionaddvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数可以 使用默认值初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the default values. 此构造函数通常在创建根节点的集合时使用，而父节点 (或所有者) 不是必需的。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of root nodes where a parent node (or owner) is not required. > [!NOTE] > 创建非根节点的集合时，应使用采用参数的重载构造函数 `owner` （而不是此构造函数）来指定父节点。When creating a collection of non-root nodes, you should use the overloaded constructor that takes the `owner` parameter, instead of this constructor, to specify the parent node. 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode owner) cil managed

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: owner
param.span: 表示集合的父节点的 对象。

span.span: The object that represents the parent node of the collection.

summary.span: 使用指定的父节点（或所有者）初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified parent node (or owner).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数，可以 使用指定的父节点 (或所有者) 初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the specified parent node (or owner). 在创建需要指定父节点的非根节点的集合时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of non-root nodes where you need to specify the parent node. > [!NOTE] > 创建根节点的集合时，请考虑使用无参数构造函数，因为根节点没有父节点。When creating a collection of root nodes, consider using the parameterless constructor because root nodes do not have a parent node. 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法创建一个可轻松循环访问的枚举器，以获取中的每一项 。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the . 若要获取枚举器中当前指向的项，请使用 属性。To get the item currently pointed to in the enumerator, use the property. 使用 方法移动到下一项。Use the method to move to the next item. 如果需要将枚举数移回集合的开始位置，请使用 方法。If you need to move the enumerator back to the beginning of the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 创建枚举器或使用 方法后，必须调用 方法。After you create an enumerator or use the method, you must call the method. 否则，由属性表示的项 是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. 作为替代方法，还可以使用 方法来创建 可用于访问集合中的项的对象。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an object that can be used to access the items in the collection. 另一种替代方法是使用 `foreach` 或 `For Each` 结构来循环访问集合。Another alternative is to use a `foreach` or `For Each` structure to iterate through the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法创建包含控件的根节点的枚举数 。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create an enumerator that contains root nodes of the control. value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的 。

span.span: A that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了的同步版本 ，可用于 (线程) 代码同步。The property provides a synchronized version of the that can be used with synchronizing (threading) code. > [!CAUTION] > 此类的属性始终返回 `false` ，这指示 类不同步 (不是线程安全的) 。The property of this class always returns `false`, which indicates that the class is not synchronized (not thread safe). 同步代码必须对 的对象执行操作 ，而不是直接对其执行操作 。Synchronizing code must perform operations on the object of the , not directly on the itself. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改对象的其他线程保持正确的同步 。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. > [!NOTE] > 此实现中返回的对象是 用于存储 集合中的对象的对象。The object returned in this implementation is the object used to store the objects in the collection. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 有关属性的详细信息 ，请参阅 接口的属性 。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

summary.span: 从目标数组的指定索引开始，将 对象中的所有项复制到兼容的一维 中。

span.span: Copies all the items from the object to a compatible one-dimensional , starting at the specified index in the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将的内容复制 到指定的从零开始的 对象。Use the method to copy the contents of the into the specified zero-based object. 从目标数组的指定索引处开始复制项。Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array. 使用 对象，您可以使用数组语法来访问中的项 。With the object, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the . 作为替代方法，还可以使用 方法来创建可用于访问集合中的项的枚举器。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法将的 值复制 到数组中。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the values of a into an array. 请注意，该 属性返回一个 对象。Notice that the property returns a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo/CS/treenodecollectioncopytocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo/VB/treenodecollectioncopytovb.aspx#1)]
